title: doc: add FAQ answer for conversion between []T1 and []T2 where each has underlying type T
body:
See [discussion on golang nuts](https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/jDcUu4gUIRc/discussion).

The post by @iant [here](https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-nuts/jDcUu4gUIRc/n5romSSSBQAJ) could be worked into a good answer to explain the reasons behind not allowing the conversion being asked about in the golang nuts thread.

/cc @adg
